fixes.name: Profit RAG
fixes.dax_expression:
IF(
    SUM('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit]) < 60000,
    1,
    IF(
        SUM('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit]) >= 60000 && SUM('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit]) <= 80000,
        2,
        3
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau IF with aggregated SUM([Profit]) into nested DAX IF statements using SUM('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit]). This is created as a measure because the calculation uses aggregation (SUM).
